item.description:
This town recreation area hosts athletic fields, a lake, forests, and a trail system. We will walk around Spring Lake and along the Farmington River. Bring a picnic lunch and we will eat when we get back from the trail.

This will be an easy walk of about 2 miles on flat terrain. Social walking pace. We will be out for 2 hours. Rain cancels. Dogs and children are welcome as long as they are calm and well behaved.

Location: 820 Old Farms Road, Avon, CT. There are two entrances. Use the one closer to route 10. Turn right at the rotary and park next to the picnic area.
http://maps.google.co...

item.name: Fisher Meadows Walk, Avon CT
